thread.title: Hot List: Vote Your Picks for 2015's Top Digital Brands, Games and Gadgets
thread.title_full: Hot List: Vote Your Picks for 2015's Top Digital Brands, Games and Gadgets

author: Adweek Staff
title: Hot List: Vote Your Picks for 2015's Top Digital Brands, Games and Gadgets
text: Hot List: Vote Your Picks for 2015's Top Digital Brands, Games and Gadgets Help determine Adweek's Readers' Choice Awards By Adweek Staff September 30, 2015, 9:01 PM EDT Cast your vote for the year's best apps, sites and digital stars. What are the apps, games and devices that (for now, at least) feel absolutely indispensable? In the Digital category of our annual Hot List Readers' Choice Awards, we want you to help name the year's most addictive and engaging bits of tech. Vote as often as you'd like through Nov. 23. The winners will be revealed on Nov. 30. And your picks areâ€¦ Want to keep voting?
